general.title: F-Bot commands
general.author: F-Bot
general.description: List of all commands. To se usage of certain command, use !help <command-name>. If you want to see recommended bot setup use !help setup.

fields.name: !permission
fields.value: Setup permissions for F-Bot commands (ex. who can use !help).

setup.title: F-Bot recommended setup
setup.author: F-Bot
setup.description: This is tutorial on setting up your bot.

fields.name: Prerequesits
fields.value: Knowledge of all commands that bot supports (To see all commands type !help).

fields.name: Setting up permissions
fields.value: By default bot comes with no restrictions on commands. To ensure not all server members can alter setting, we recommend to setup permissions for each command. To setup permissions use !permission command. For more details use !help permission.

permission.title: More details on permission command
permission.author: F-Bot
permission.description: This command allows you to declare which roles can invoke certain commands.

fields.name: <action>
fields.value: ```invoke-command``` - used to set who can invoke a command

fields.name: <command-name>
fields.value: Command to which permission is assigned. To se full list of commands type !help.

fields.name: <role-that-can-execute>
fields.value: Tag of role. Users with this role can execute a permission.
